function_arguments.document_code:
from docx.enum.style import WD_STYLE_TYPE
import matplotlib.patches as mpatches
import datetime as dt
import matplotlib.dates as mdates

styles = doc.styles
# Normal
normal = styles['Normal']
normal.font.name = 'Calibri'
normal.font.size = Pt(11)

# Caption style (create if missing)
if 'Caption' not in [s.name for s in styles]:
    cap = styles.add_style('Caption', WD_STYLE_TYPE.PARAGRAPH)
    cap.font.name = 'Calibri'
    cap.font.size = Pt(9)
    cap.font.italic = True

def add_caption(text: str):
    p = doc.add_paragraph(text, style='Caption')
    p.alignment = WD_ALIGN_PARAGRAPH.CENTER
    return p

# Title Page
logo_path = output_dir / 'argano_logo.png'
# Just for document consistency - not inserting a real logo

doc.add_heading('Kastle Systems ERP Modernization Proposal', level=0)
doc.add_paragraph('Prepared for: Kastle Systems')
doc.add_paragraph('Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations')
doc.add_paragraph('Confidential: External use or disclosure of any information contained in this document without written permission of Argano, LLC is prohibited.', style='Caption')
doc.add_page_break()

# Letter of Transmittal
from datetime import date

doc.add_paragraph(f"Letter of Transmittal to Kastle Systems ({date.today().strftime('%B %d, %Y')})\nRe: RFP")
doc.add_paragraph("To whom it may concern, this response to the Kastle Systems RFP is hereby submitted by Argano:")
doc.add_paragraph('Submitted by:')
doc.add_paragraph('Argano\n6100 West Plano Parkway\nSuite 1800\nPlano, Texas 75093\nAttn: Legal: Elizabeth Frederic')
doc.add_paragraph('Vendor Contact Information:', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('SAM/CSM Name: John Smith, Senior Account Manager, 555-123-4567, john.smith@argano.com', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('DSE/DCE Name: Jane Doe, Solution Director, 555-987-6543, jane.doe@argano.com', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Kastle Contact Information:', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Name: Sarah Green\nTitle: Procurement Manager\nPhone: 555-555-1212\nEmail: sarah.green@kastle.com')
doc.add_page_break()

# Table of Contents
sections = [
    'Executive Summary',
    'Company Overview',
    'Service Capabilities',
    'Implementation Plan and Details',
    'Proposed Timeline',
    'Resources',
    'Client References',
    'Terms and Conditions',
    'Pricing Proposal',
    'Appendix 1 - Responsibilities'
]
toc = doc.add_paragraph('TABLE OF CONTENTS')
toc.style = doc.styles['Heading 1']
for idx, section in enumerate(sections, 1):
    doc.add_paragraph(f"{idx} {section}", style='Normal')
doc.add_page_break()

# Executive Summary
exec_head = doc.add_heading('Executive Summary', level=1)
exec_head.paragraph_format.space_before = Pt(18)
exec_head.paragraph_format.space_after = Pt(6)
doc.add_paragraph("Argano, LLC (\"Argano\") is pleased to submit this proposal in response to Kastle Systems' RFP for ERP modernization. Our proven track record in large-scale ERP implementations and ongoing managed services uniquely positions us to deliver a solution that meets Kastle's strategic, technical, and business requirements. Our extensive expertise in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations, deep industry knowledge, and commitment to partnership ensure your objectives will be achieved—on time, within budget, and with high adoption.")
doc.add_paragraph('Our proposal addresses all mandatory requirements, including system design, integration, data migration, training, managed services, and transparent pricing. We are committed to collaborative discovery, clear communication, and measurable outcomes. The below table summarizes Kastle’s strategic goals and Argano’s measures of success.')

# Strategic Goals Table
str_table = doc.add_table(rows=1, cols=2)
str_table.style = 'Table Grid'
str_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER
hdr = str_table.rows[0].cells
hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text = 'Strategic Goals', 'Measures of Success'
for cell in hdr:
    for run in cell.paragraphs[0].runs:
        run.bold = True
str_data = [
    ('Single ERP application for consolidated operations and reporting', 'Internal productivity increase'),
    ('Increased inventory and shipping visibility', 'Improved management of supply chain and orders'),
    ('Less IT maintenance and licensing costs', 'IT can free up bandwidth to work on other projects')
]
for g, m in str_data:
    row = str_table.add_row().cells
    row[0].text = g
    row[1].text = m

# Implementation timeline visual
plt.figure(figsize=(8, 4.5))
sns.set_style('whitegrid')
data = pd.DataFrame({'Phase': ['Initiation', 'Analysis', 'Design & Develop', 'Deploy', 'Optimize'],
                     'Weeks': [2, 3, 10, 3, 2]})
ax = sns.barplot(data=data, x='Phase', y='Weeks', palette='Blues_d')
ax.set_title('Proposed ERP Implementation Timeline')
ax.set_ylabel('Duration (Weeks)')
plt.tight_layout()
timeline_chart_path = output_dir / 'timeline_chart.png'
plt.savefig(timeline_chart_path, dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight', facecolor='white')
plt.close()
doc.add_picture(str(timeline_chart_path), width=Inches(5.8))
add_caption('Figure 1: Proposed ERP implementation timeline by phase')

# Executive Summary - Cost Table
cost_table = doc.add_table(rows=2, cols=3)
cost_table.style = 'Table Grid'
cost_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER
cost_table.autofit = False
hdr = cost_table.rows[0].cells
hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text = 'Description', 'Estimated Fees (Low)', 'Estimated Fees (High)'
for run in hdr[0].paragraphs[0].runs:
    run.bold = True
for run in hdr[1].paragraphs[0].runs:
    run.bold = True
for run in hdr[2].paragraphs[0].runs:
    run.bold = True
row = cost_table.rows[1].cells
row[0].text = 'Estimated Professional Services'
row[1].text = '$XXX'
row[2].text = '$XXX'

doc.add_page_break()

# Company Overview
doc.add_heading('Company Overview', level=1)
doc.add_paragraph(
    "Argano is a global consulting firm and top-ranked Microsoft Dynamics Gold Certified Partner that empowers organizations to digitally transform and grow their businesses. Our expert consultants deliver strategic consulting, implementation services, application and technical support, managed services, and packaged solutions leveraging Microsoft Dynamics ERP, CRM, Business Intelligence/Analytics, Power Platform, and related Microsoft cloud technologies.\n"
    "As a member of Microsoft’s Inner Circle and winner of US Partner of the Year for Dynamics 365 Finance, Argano specializes in global implementations for clients with complex business processes. Our ERP team is experienced in delivering solutions for manufacturing and distribution organizations requiring efficiency, relevance, and responsiveness.\n"
    "Our long history across industries enables us to align with our clients’ strategic objectives and help them re-engineer and redefine their operations—breaking down silos, streamlining processes, and delivering outstanding customer experiences.\n"
    "Argano is recognized for excellent sales performance, breadth of services, and industry-leading expertise. Our strengths include:\n"
)
doc.add_paragraph('Success implementing and supporting complete system solutions across manufacturing and distribution industries', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Deep experience supporting, migrating, and upgrading clients from early Dynamics versions to Dynamics 365', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Credentialed, experienced consultants leveraging industry best practices', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Agile and Iterative Implementation Methodology for rapid ownership and reduced project costs', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('Executive commitment to client success', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_page_break()

# Service Capabilities
svc_head = doc.add_heading('Service Capabilities', level=1)
svc_head.paragraph_format.space_before = Pt(18)
svc_head.paragraph_format.space_after = Pt(6)
doc.add_paragraph(
    "Argano consulting services for Kastle's ERP Modernization include leading, collaborating, and assisting Kastle teams with all activities: business process analysis, solution design, build, development, integration, training, and testing. Our project management services ensure coordination of all consultants and activities. Kastle will also provide a project manager to work alongside Argano's PM, ensuring all client responsibilities are met.\n"
    "The primary goal is to deliver a high-level estimate and implementation approach for the ERP modernization, addressing all business and technical requirements described in the RFP."
)
doc.add_heading('Objectives', level=2)
doc.add_paragraph('• Consolidate operations and reporting into a single ERP platform', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• Increase productivity, visibility, and supply chain management', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• Minimize IT maintenance and licensing overhead', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_heading('Scope', level=2)
doc.add_paragraph('Locations: Kastle HQ, Regional Office 1, Regional Office 2')
doc.add_paragraph('Unless otherwise stated, all services will be performed remotely. Any travel will be pre-arranged and agreed between Kastle and Argano, adhering to company and government policies.')
doc.add_heading('Business Functions In-Scope', level=2)
doc.add_paragraph('General Accounting, Business Decision Support, Lead to Cash, Project Management, Service, Procure to Pay, Inventory Management, Warehouse Management', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_page_break()

# Key Project Assumptions
assump_head = doc.add_heading('Key Project Assumptions', level=1)
assump_head.paragraph_format.space_before = Pt(18)
assump_head.paragraph_format.space_after = Pt(6)
doc.add_paragraph('Argano’s proposed services and estimates are based on the following project assumptions:')
doc.add_paragraph('• Kastle will provide timely access to key stakeholders, environments, and data', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• Data migration scope will include defined subset of master and transactional data', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• Required integrations will be limited to those identified in discovery (Dynamics CRM, Concur, Dayforce, Planful, NCA)', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• All reasonable and necessary travel and expenses will be tracked and billed separately', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_paragraph('• System enhancements will be minimized; business process changes preferred where feasible', style='List Bullet')
doc.add_page_break()

# Data Migration Table
mig_table = doc.add_table(rows=1, cols=4)
mig_table.style = 'Table Grid'
mig_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER
hdr = mig_table.rows[0].cells
hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text, hdr[3].text = 'Data Area', 'Type', 'Conversion Process', 'Notes'
for cell in hdr:
    for run in cell.paragraphs[0].runs:
        run.bold = True
mig_data = [
    ('Chart of Accounts', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Contacts', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Customers', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Employees', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Exchange Rates', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Fixed Assets', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('G/L – Beg Acct Balances', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Leads', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', 'Legacy CRM'),
    ('Open Purchase Orders', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Opportunities', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Products – Master List', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Projects', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Prospects', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Vendors', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Workers', 'Master Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Bank Transactions', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Customer Transactions', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('G/L - Transactions', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Open Sales Orders', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Vendor Transactions', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Open Purchase Orders', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Open Production Orders', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', ''),
    ('Open Transfer Orders', 'Transactional Data', 'Extract, cleanse, import', '')
]
for area, typ, proc, notes in mig_data:
    row = mig_table.add_row().cells
    row[0].text = area
    row[1].text = typ
    row[2].text = proc
    row[3].text = notes

doc.add_page_break()

# Implementation Plan and Details
impl_head = doc.add_heading('Implementation Plan and Details', level=1)
impl_head.paragraph_format.space_before = Pt(18)
impl_head.paragraph_format.space_after = Pt(6)
doc.add_heading('Project Approach', level=2)
doc.add_paragraph(
    "Argano Delivery Methodology (ADM) is based on an agile adaptation of the Microsoft Dynamics Sure Step process—proven effective and efficient for ERP implementations. ADM emphasizes out-of-the-box functionality, super user education in IT and functional areas, and business process re-engineering.\n"
    "Argano provides a dedicated Executive Sponsor, working directly with Kastle leadership and the project team to reduce risk and maximize value. ADM organizes the project into 5 phases: Project Initiation, Analyze, Design & Develop, Deploy, Optimize."
)
# Mermaid Diagram - Delivery Methodology
mermaid_code = '''
flowchart TD
  Init[Project Initiation] --> Analyze[Analyze]
  Analyze --> Design[Design & Develop]
  Design --> Deploy[Deploy]
  Deploy --> Optimize[Optimize]
'''
diagram_path = render_mermaid(mermaid_code, 'adm_methodology')
doc.add_picture(str(diagram_path), width=Inches(5.8))
add_caption('Figure 2: Argano Delivery Methodology Phases')

# Implementation Plan Table
phases = [
    ('Project Initiation', 'Project management, governance setup, environment setup, change control', 'Argano/Kastle'),
    ('Analyze', 'D365 concept training, scope review, gap analysis, integration & enhancement identification, data migration planning', 'Argano/Kastle'),
    ('Design & Develop', 'Solution design, build, integration, reporting, data migration, testing, training', 'Argano/Kastle'),
    ('Deploy', 'UAT, go-live readiness, production environment, cutover, end-user training', 'Argano/Kastle'),
    ('Optimize', 'Post-go-live support, solution tuning, transition to managed services', 'Argano')
]
plan_table = doc.add_table(rows=1, cols=3)
plan_table.style = 'Table Grid'
plan_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER
hdr = plan_table.rows[0].cells
hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text = 'Phase', 'Key Activities', 'Responsibility'
for cell in hdr:
    for run in cell.paragraphs[0].runs:
        run.bold = True
for phase, act, resp in phases:
    row = plan_table.add_row().cells
    row[0].text = phase
    row[1].text = act
    row[2].text = resp

doc.add_page_break()

# Proposed Timeline (Gantt Chart)
schedule = pd.DataFrame({
    'Task': ['Project Initiation', 'Analysis', 'Design & Develop', 'Deploy', 'Optimize'],
    'Team': ['PMO', 'Business Analysts', 'Solution/Dev Team', 'QA/Training', 'Support'],
    'Start': pd.to_datetime(['2026-03-01', '2026-03-15', '2026-04-01', '2026-05-15', '2026-06-01']),
    'End': pd.to_datetime(['2026-03-14', '2026-03-31', '2026-05-14', '2026-05-31', '2026-06-15'])
})
project_start = schedule['Start'].min()
schedule['days_to_start'] = (schedule['Start'] - project_start).dt.days
schedule['duration'] = (schedule['End'] - schedule['Start']).dt.days + 1
team_colors = {
    'PMO': '#3498db',
    'Business Analysts': '#9b59b6',
    'Solution/Dev Team': '#2ecc71',
    'QA/Training': '#e74c3c',
    'Support': '#34495e'
}
fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))
for idx, row in schedule.iterrows():
    ax.barh(y=row['Task'], width=row['duration'], left=row['days_to_start'],
            color=team_colors[row['Team']], edgecolor='white', linewidth=0.5)
ax.invert_yaxis()
max_days = schedule['days_to_start'].max() + schedule['duration'].max()
exticks = np.arange(0, max_days + 7, 14)
exticklabels = pd.date_range(start=project_start, periods=len(xticks), freq='14D').strftime('%b %d')
ax.set_xticks(xticks[:len(xticklabels)])
ax.set_xticklabels(xticklabels, fontsize=9)
ax.set_xlabel('Timeline', fontsize=10)
ax.set_title('Project Implementation Schedule', fontsize=14, fontweight='bold')
ax.xaxis.grid(True, alpha=0.3, linestyle='--')
ax.set_axisbelow(True)
unique_teams = schedule['Team'].unique()
patches = [mpatches.Patch(color=team_colors[team], label=team) for team in unique_teams]
ax.legend(handles=patches, loc='lower right', fontsize=8, framealpha=0.9)
plt.tight_layout()
gantt_path = output_dir / 'project_gantt.png'
plt.savefig(gantt_path, dpi=150, bbox_inches='tight', facecolor='white')
plt.close()
doc.add_heading('Proposed Timeline', level=1)
doc.add_paragraph('The below Gantt chart outlines the key phases and timeline for ERP modernization, subject to further refinement during discovery.')
doc.add_picture(str(gantt_path), width=Inches(6.0))
add_caption('Figure 3: Project Implementation Schedule')
doc.add_page_break()

# Resources
doc.add_heading('Resources', level=1)
doc.add_paragraph('Named resources are part of Argano onboarding and project initiation. The project leadership team will be assigned at SOW execution and project start, including:')

res_table.style = 'Table Grid'
res_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER

hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text = 'Name', 'Title', 'Project Role'

]

# Terms and Conditions

doc.add_paragraph('If Argano is awarded the work, the corresponding Master Service Agreement (MSA) and Statement of Work (SOW) will govern the implementation. Service Level Agreement (SLA) details will be included in the SOW.')

# Pricing Proposal
doc.add_heading('Pricing Proposal', level=1)
pricing_table = doc.add_table(rows=7, cols=5)
pricing_table.style = 'Table Grid'

hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text, hdr[3].text, hdr[4].text = 'Phase', 'Estimated Low Hours', 'Estimated High Hours', 'Estimated Extended Low Fees', 'Estimated Extended High Fees'

    for run in cell.paragraphs[0].runs:
        run.bold = True

    ('Analysis', '200', '240', '$30,000', '$36,000'),
    ('Design & Develop', '650', '800', '$97,500', '$120,000'),
    ('Deploy', '130', '160', '$19,500', '$24,000'),
    ('Optimize', '60', '80', '$9,000', '$12,000'),
    ('Total Consulting Services', '1160', '1430', '$174,000', '$214,500'),
    ('Managed Services (Annual)', '---', '---', '$34,000', '$42,000')
]

    row = pricing_table.add_row().cells

    row[1].text = lh
    row[2].text = hh
    row[3].text = lf
    row[4].text = hf

doc.add_paragraph('All reasonable and necessary travel and expenses will be listed as a separate item. Customization, historical/current data migration, storage, backup, and network infrastructure costs are detailed in the attached pricing template.')
doc.add_page_break()

# Training & Education
doc.add_heading('Training & Education', level=1)
doc.add_paragraph('Argano delivers comprehensive ERP training programs, including instructor-led onsite or remote sessions, self-paced eLearning, train-the-trainer workshops, and end-user training. Our sample training materials and pricing are provided in the appendices.')
doc.add_paragraph('Training formats available: Online, Webinar, In-person. Pricing is based on scope and delivery method. Please contact us for detailed pricing and availability.')
doc.add_paragraph('Argano provides training content options: Slide decks, Quick Reference Guides (QRGs), Learning labs, Learning videos, Competency test questions.')
doc.add_page_break()

# Security, Privacy, and Compliance
doc.add_heading('Security, Privacy, and Compliance', level=1)
doc.add_paragraph('Security is central to our ERP solution. Argano deploys Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), follows Microsoft Security Protocols, and designs custom roles as required. Data privacy and compliance are ensured through rigorous controls and audit trails. All regulatory requirements, conflicts of interest, lawsuits, and acquisitions are disclosed and tracked per RFP requirements.')
doc.add_page_break()

# Compliance Matrix

req_table.style = 'Table Grid'
req_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER

        run.bold = True

# Appendix - Responsibilities
doc.add_heading('Appendix 2 - Responsibilities Matrix', level=1)
resp_table = doc.add_table(rows=1, cols=3)
resp_table.style = 'Table Grid'
resp_table.alignment = WD_TABLE_ALIGNMENT.CENTER
hdr = resp_table.rows[0].cells
hdr[0].text, hdr[1].text, hdr[2].text = 'Responsibility', 'Client', 'Argano'
for cell in hdr:
    for run in cell.paragraphs[0].runs:
        run.bold = True
resp_data = [
    ('Provide a project manager empowered to make decisions', 'X', ''),
    ('Provide management support and proactive schedule/resource management', 'X', ''),
    ('Provide executive leadership to drive project change', 'X', ''),
    ('Provide access to key business and IT stakeholders', 'X', ''),
    ('Provide organization-wide oversight for super-users and IT involvement', 'X', ''),
    ('Ensure qualified team for business process determination', 'X', ''),
    ('Identify local project managers at each location', 'X', ''),
    ('Implement required changes to business processes', 'X', ''),
